Bash(cat > '/c/Users/Admin/Desktop/show time/docs/sessions/SESSION-REPORT-2026-02-25-evening.md' << 'ENDOFFILE' # Session Report ‚Äî 25 February 2026 \(Evening\) ## Overview Long session covering two major workstreams: \(1\) closing out all remaining tool audit issues with 0 ‚ùå achieved, and \(2\) a full feature buildout of the admin panel from 4 read-only views into a complete operational tool with 9 new features. Also included dashboard redesign, Railway deployment fixes, and project-level process improvements. --- ## Part 1 ‚Äî Audit Data-Layer Bug Fixes ### Background The previous session built `scripts/audit-tools.cjs` which checks all 30 tools across 6 criteria. After fixing the visible UI issues \(transitions, cover images, resize handles, slugs\) in earlier passes, 5 data-layer issues remained ‚Äî tools were silently dropping saved data because their `questionMappings` keys didn't match what existed in `tool_questions` in the DB. `ToolDB` drops any key not found in that table without throwing an error, making these bugs invisible until the audit script was written. ### Root Cause Schema drift: over multiple development sessions, `tool_questions` rows were added, removed, or renamed in the DB but the corresponding HTML tool files were never updated to match \(or vice versa\). ### Fixes Applied **1. WOOP ‚Äî nested objects not matching flat DB keys** The tool saved `premortem` and `elephant` as nested JS objects. The DB expects individual flat keys \(`premortem_scenario`, `premortem_cause_0‚Äì2`, `elephant_goal`, `elephant_slice_0‚Äì2`, `elephant_first_slice`\). Fixed by explicitly flattening at submit time in `questionMappings`. Also fixed: cover image was a local `url\(cover.jpg\)` reference ‚Üí replaced with Unsplash URL. Two legacy DB keys \(`obstacle_external`, `reflection`\) no longer in the tool were deleted from `tool_questions`. **2. DREAM ‚Äî phantom DB keys** DB had `dream_visualization` and `killer_conclusion` which the tool never saved. The tool saved `golden_circle`, `dream_answers`, `mood_board` which didn't exist in DB. Fixed via DB migration: deleted the phantom rows, inserted the correct keys. > Note: First migration attempt failed ‚Äî `column "question_order" does not exist`. Real column name is `display_order`, discovered via `information_schema.columns`. **3. TEAM ‚Äî wrong invented key names** The team phase `questionMappings` used invented names \(`team_score_compilation`, `improvement_plan`\) instead of the actual DB keys \(`dysfunction_scorecard`, `trust_action_plan`, `conflict_norms`, `conflict_resolution_strategies`, `accountability_tracker`\). Fixed by rewriting the mappings. **4. CASH ‚Äî missing `action_plan` key** DB has both `action_plan` and `action_sheets`. Tool only saved `action_sheets`. Fixed by aliasing ‚Äî both keys now point to the same filtered actions array. **5. CORE-ACTIVITIES ‚Äî no transition overlay** Tool had AI challenge per step but no BRUTAL TRUTH / PEER PROOF overlay between steps. Added `TRANSITION_CONTENT` to CONFIG, a 4-second `advanceToStep\(\)` function, and the fixed-position overlay JSX. **6. Audit script false positive** The `checkCoverImage` regex was matching a `FastTrack_F_black.png` logo embedded in a PDF export block. Fixed by narrowing the regex to only match `` in new tab. | | **Cohort Progress Grid** | CompaniesView | Members/Progress toggle inside expanded org. 30-column ‚úÖ/‚Äì grid per member. Pure client-side. | | **Org CRUD** | CompaniesView | EDIT/DEL per org + NEW COMPANY modal. Name + LearnWorlds tag inputs. | | **Webhook Monitor** | Logs ‚Üí Webhooks | All events with OK/ERR badges + REPLAY button \(re-POSTs payload to backend\). | | **AI Stats** | Logs ‚Üí AI Stats | Per-tool: total, revised, forced-submit, pass %, avg tokens, avg ms. Color-coded pass rate. | | **Export CSV** | Users header | Downloads filtered user list. Pure JS Blob + ``. | ### Implementation Method Used haiku subagents \(3 parallel-ready passes\) to maximise speed: - DB migration \(direct MCP\): `admin_notes` table with `UNIQUE\(target_type, target_id\)` - Pass A \(haiku\): UserDrawer ‚Äî user edit + tool unlock + admin notes - Pass B+C \(haiku\): Companies + Logs in one agent pass - Pass D \(haiku\): Export CSV + View as User **Result: 1,150 ‚Üí 1,510 lines. All 12 feature verification checks passed.** --- ## Part 7 ‚Äî Admin Panel Design Alignment ### Problem Admin panel used old colour palette \(`#555`, `#444`, `#ccc`\) inconsistent with the dashboard brand. ### Dashboard Design Tokens Applied | Token | Value | |-------|-------| | Primary text | `#fff` | | Secondary text | `#B2B2B2` | | Accent | `#FFF469` | | Card background | `#1a1a1a` | | Label font | Monument Grotesk, monospace | | Scrollbar hover | `#FFF469` | | Border-radius | `0` everywhere | ### Font Path Fix The admin panel HTML used `../shared/fonts/` \(correct for the main repo path\) but the standalone Railway deployment serves from its own root where fonts live in `fonts/`. Fixed with dual `src` in each `@font-face`: ```css src: url\('../shared/fonts/Plaak3Trial-43-Bold.woff2'\) format\('woff2'\), url\('fonts/Plaak3Trial-43-Bold.woff2'\) format\('woff2'\); ``` The first URL works when served from the main repo; the second works in the standalone deployment. Both now load correctly. --- ## Part 8 ‚Äî Process Improvements ### CLAUDE.md Created `CLAUDE.md` in the project root with the critical deployment rule that was missing and causing repeated Railway MCP confusion: > **ALWAYS push to GitHub. NEVER use the Railway MCP to deploy directly. Railway auto-deploys from GitHub.** | Service | GitHub repo | |---------|-------------| | Frontend + Backend | `github.com/bgzbgz/show-time` | | Admin panel | `github.com/bgzbgz/admin-panel-tools` | | Guru modal | `github.com/bgzbgz/guru-modal` | `CLAUDE.md` is automatically read by Claude Code at the start of every session, so this rule will be followed without needing to be re-stated. --- ## Commits This Session ``` 5e6c7db fix: font fallback paths for standalone admin panel deployment 813c8cb design: align admin panel to dashboard brand tokens 2030780 docs: add CLAUDE.md with deployment rules 9a24cb7 feat: admin panel ‚Äî user edit, tool unlock, admin notes, cohort grid, org CRUD, webhook monitor, AI stats, CSV export, view-as-user 8bdd324 design: all small Monument Grotesk text ‚Üí white 1fb84f3 design: grey body text ‚Üí white 008e539 design: dashboard full brand redesign f1cab9d fix: resolve 5 audit data-layer issues ‚Äî 0 ‚ùå achieved ``` --- ## Pending / Next Session - `dashboard.html?preview_uid` handling ‚Äî the View as User link is deployed but `dashboard.html` doesn't yet read the param.
